justification: Offer ignores B’s urgent need for RB stability by asking them to give up their only Tier 2 RB for a committee RB3. While Isaiah Thompson fits ‘young ascending,’ B already has strong WRs, so positional incentive is weak. Rationale is generic and mismatched (labels the wrong WR as low-volatility), showing limited ToM. Trade is plausible but not well-aligned with B’s preferences or situation.
